description: Whether itâ€™s a home, office, or restaurant, interior design transforms a space. Learn the basics of interior design, including design concepts, aesthetics, and presentation. Spread over four weeks, the course is designed for anyone with an interest in interior design. Complete a mini-project by the end of the course to put your learning into action. Watch tutorials and videos, and participate in discussions during the course.
title: Essentials of Interior Design
